pr_title: autorest.java for Android: Add implementation to fix imports in models

timeline.message: Add implementation to fix imports in models
Add implementation to fix imports in models
Move code to right place; Correct package names for code files
Not to make members protected in ClientModel

timeline.bodyText: Suggest to add a bit javadoc on it to clarify that it is the extension point for a different builder subclass.
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: Added documentation. I agree with your last comment about extending Builder class. IMHO, the builder should not be embedded (and assuming there is never a need to override). We'd first identify these cases during our Android effort to see if we need to refactor the Builders. Anyway, I won't make any change to the builders unless we have to.
replies.author: JianpingChen
